answers.answer: This is a very mild abnormality.  Just follow up as scheduled and see your ophthalmologist ASAP if you have any new flashes or floaters.Dr. O.

question: Hi I'm a 51 y/o female with Type II diabetes for 5 years, well controlled taking metformin 500mg bid and glipizide 5mg bid. My opthomologist dx thinning retina on my right eye lower lateral. What should I look for , so far no flashes, no floaters......anything else and what can I do preventative?Thanks, Corinne
title: Thinning retina
